title: Wikipedia Module
text:
from wikiapp.wikipedia import random_page, Page
from nbdev import show_doc

title: Wikipedia Module
text:
Examples

page = random_page()
print("TITLE", page.title)
print("EXTRACT", page.extract)

TITLE Tiruppavai
EXTRACT The Tiruppavai is a set of Tamil Hindu hymns attributed to the female poet-saint Andal.


If you do this agian, you will get another random page:

page = random_page()
print("TITLE", page.title)
print("EXTRACT", page.extract)

TITLE Myntra
EXTRACT Myntra is an Indian fashion e-commerce company headquartered in Bengaluru, Karnataka, India. The company was founded in 2007-2008 to sell personalized gift items. In May 2014, Myntra.com was acquired by Flipkart.


You can change the language

page = random_page(language="fr")
print("TITLE", page.title)
print("EXTRACT", page.extract)

TITLE La Soumission du prince Dipo Negoro au g√©n√©ral De Kock
EXTRACT La Soumission du prince Dipo Negoro au g√©n√©ral De Kock est un tableau peint par Nicolaas Pieneman vers 1830-1835.

title: Wikiapp Docs
text:
Welcome to the documentation for Wikiapp! We are so glad top have you here.
This library will let you get random wikipedia excerpts, in any language.
Yeah we know it does not do much! But it is a start.

text:
from wikiapp.console import main
